companies.name: Physical Intelligence
companies.reason: AI robotics research lab that raised a $400 million Series A in November 2024, reaching a $2.4 billion valuation and becoming a unicorn, with backing from Jeff Bezos and major venture firms.

companies.name: LogicMonitor
companies.reason: SaaS-based observability platform that raised $800 million in November 2024 at a $2.4 billion valuation, focusing on AI-driven data center monitoring and disrupting the DevOps landscape.

companies.name: Halcyon
companies.reason: Cybersecurity startup specializing in anti-ransomware solutions; achieved unicorn status in November 2024 with a $100 million Series C funding round, valuing the company at $1 billion.
